title: Adrianus Taroreh
text: Adrianus Taroreh (3 August 1966 – 5 February 2013) was an Indonesian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>.
